summary: Full video content of The Block’s interviews at CoinAlts Fund Symposium
author: The Block
The Block
title: CoinAlts Fund Symposium 2019: The Block Interview Series
content: At the recent 2019 CoinAlts Fund Symposium in Chicago, The Block invited nine industry leaders to share their thoughts on some of the biggest trends within the industry. Here are the highlights from our interviews, featuring CME Group, Grayscale, Union Square Ventures, Bitwise, Amun, Outlier Ventures, Tagomi, Fireblocks, KNØX, and Amun.
Teddy Fusaro - Bitwise Asset Management, COO
Rayhaneh Sharif-Askary - Grayscale, Director of Sales and Business Development
Nick Grossman - Union Square Ventures, Partner
Tim McCourt - CME Group, Global Head of Equity Index and Alternative Investment Products
Michael Shaulov - Fireblocks, CoFounder and CEO
